faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Nano Banana2
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial with 30 credits (3x 2K images) so you can explore our features.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans. You can choose between monthly or annual billing, or purchase credits as needed.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 14-day refund policy for all paid plans. If you are not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team at lixin720190@gmail.com for any assistance.

cta.title: Ready to get started?

brand.title: Nano Banana2
brand.description: Nano Banana2 is your ultimate AI image generation platform. Nano Banana2 is an independent platform powered by Google's Gemini models. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Google.
